metaData.description: This data entity provides meta data about the first mile farm data

0_exportDate.description: Date when the data has been exported from the database into first-mile-farm-data-schema
0_exportDate.title: Export date

1_dataProvidersID.description: Legal registration number of the organisation that converted its data into first-mile-farm-data-schema
1_dataProvidersID.title: Legal registration number of the data provider

2_dataProvidersName.description: Official name of the organisation that converted its data into First Mile Data Format
2_dataProvidersName.title: data provider name

3_dataProvidersGeolocation.description: Location of the frontdoor of head office of the organisation that converted it's data into first-mile-farm-data-schemaindicated by WGS84 Lat-Long Coordinates ddd.dddd
3_dataProvidersGeolocation.title: Geolocation of the data provider

4_datasetDescription.description: Description of the data set that is converted into first-mile-farm-data-schema
4_datasetDescription.title: Dataset description

5_dataProvidersPointofContact.description: Contact point of the organisation that converted it's data into first-mile-farm-data-schema
5_dataProvidersPointofContact.title: data provider point of contact

6_dataProvidersAdress.description: The legally registered address of the organisation that converted it's data into first-mile-farm-data-schema.
6_dataProvidersAdress.title: data providers lega; adress

metaData.title: Meta_data
